name: American Truck Parking 3D
description:
Have you ever wanted to know how is to park a truck? In this truck parking game, you can choose between 8 trucks, 24 parking lot levels, 24 dock levels and free ride mode! Parking a truck is can be a difficult challenge sometimes, do you think you can park the truck in every situation?

In this 3d truck game you will find:
-24 parking lot levels
-24 dock levels
-Free ride mode
-8 Quarry levels
-Fill Gas Stations Mode
-Free Ride Australia (3 trailers attached)
-8 different american trucks
-Accelerometer steering or slider steering
-Smooth gameplay

More levels coming soon!
